title: Eternal Mystery
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hmm hm hm, hmmm~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, Kayo-chin, that song...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, did you figure it out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Itâ€™s the theme song for the School Idol Rangers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Correct! It was so fun to perform that play with everyone. You looked like you were having a blast, which reminded me just how much I love your high-energy vibe, Rin-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, youâ€™re making me blush! If youâ€™re that happy about it, maybe I should put together another play~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, do it, do it! Iâ€™m still hung up on whether or not Ai-san was a friend or foe at the end of the play!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sharp as always, Kayo-chin! We left it ambiguous because Ai-san hasnâ€™t decided whether she wants to be a friend or a foe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wait... Youâ€™re saying it hasnâ€™t been decided if sheâ€™s a friend or a foe yet? This is gonna drive me crazy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Thatâ€™ll remain an eternal mystery until Ai-san decides, nya...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
